name: xfmrot
description: Tool to apply a transformation defined in a transform file to an input vector file.

inputs.description: Transform file, can be an eddy_correct/eddy log file or a .mat file.
inputs.name: Transform file

inputs.description: Input vector file which can be formatted in 3 rows or 3 columns.
inputs.name: Input vector file

inputs.description: Output vector file will have the same format as input.
inputs.name: Output vector file

output-files.description: The transformed output vector file with the same format as input.
output-files.name: Transformed vector file

author: FreeSurfer Developers
